document_name: Revised Deomocratic Instituions Programme Management Arrangement Doc (00057667).pdf
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/ETH/00047799/Revised Deomocratic Instituions Programme Management Arrangement Doc (00057667).pdf

outputs.output_descr: The programme is managed by UNDP through its Programme Coordinating Unit it established. The programme supports seven national key democratic institutions of Ethiopia (Human Rights Commission, Institute of the Ombudsman, National Election Board, House of Peoples' Representative, House of Federation, Ethics and Anticorruption Commission and Federal Office Audit General) as well as Regional State Councils, House of Nationalities (one regional state), Regional Ethics and Anticorruption Commissions and Regional Offices of Auditor General. The programme aims at building the institutional capacity of these national and regional key democratic institutions  to enable them carry out thier legal missions effectively.

project_descr: Institutional Capacity Building Programme of Democratic Institutions of Ethiopia
